mapper.select: SELECT * from house h,houseinformation hi,facility f where h.house_id = hi.house_id and h.house_id=f.house_id
select c.house_id,count(*) as houseCommentCount from house h,comment c where h.house_id=c.house_id GROUP BY c.house_id
mapper.insert: insert into house (house_id, house_name, house_price, deposit, house_number, house_address, house_area, house_model, live_nubmer, character_des, internal_sit, traffic_sit, surrounding_sit, house_imgurl, longitude, latitude, publisher_id, user_id ) values (#{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liveNubmer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{characterDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{internalSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trafficSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surroundingSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

publisher_id,

mapper.update:
update house
house_name = #{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_price = #{housePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_number = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_address = #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_area = #{houseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_model = #{houseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
live_nubmer = #{liveNubmer,jdbcType=INTEGER},
character_des = #{characterDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
internal_sit = #{internalSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
traffic_sit = #{trafficSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surrounding_sit = #{surroundingSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
house_imgurl = #{houseImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL},
publisher_id = #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update house set house_name = #{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_price = #{housePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deposit = #{deposit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_number = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, house_address = #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_area = #{houseArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_model = #{houseModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, live_nubmer = #{liveNubmer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, character_des = #{characterDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, internal_sit = #{internalSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, traffic_sit = #{trafficSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surrounding_sit = #{surroundingSit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, house_imgurl = #{houseImgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, publisher_id = #{publisherId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where house_id = #{houseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
